import axios from"axios";import{GET_ITEMS,ADD_ITEM,DELETE_ITEM,ITEMS_LOADING}from"./types";//dispatch is where a thunk comes in, asychronous request
export var getItems=function getItems(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get("/api/items").then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_ITEMS,payload:res.data});});};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/items",item).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_ITEM,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/items/".concat(id)).then(function(Res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_ITEM,payload:id});});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:ITEMS_LOADING};};
